Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI was able to find details I may have missed.
Unlike my teacher, the feedback was obviously more vague despite how it may have helped me. It wasn't as detailed as the feedback i received from AI

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: It made me feel more reassured i was on the right track with assignments, I could submit the rubric and my written assessment and ask AI to mark i like a teacher then compare the feedbacks I would get from my teacher. This i felt was a good idea to combine the two together
